column4: Hashbrown was the best part of the sandwich. Egg was unique but in the background. Bacon jam stuff was solid, jalepeno was a welcome touch when it came through. Espresso was intense and dark fruity.

Overall really liked this sandwich. Liked the choice of the potato bun with the hashbrown and delicious bacon jam, and the jalapeno was a nice fresh touch. Was not a huge fan of the square egg, lacked egg flavor.
Structural integrity was great. Minus a point for a store bought bun. Minus a half point for too sweet of a bacon jam. Plus half a point for picking a potato roll of choice. Vibe was too hip for me.

Aside from the crunchy hashbrown, it was a very s o f t sandwich?? Loved the potato bun. Felt like the jalepenos couldve been a touch more spicy ğŸŒ¶ï¸ The line was insane; idk if it's worth the wait (if we hadn't gotten there earlier)
